description.value:
Special: Corrosive, Spray, Toxic (2)

Note: Can't be Acquired. Instead gained by Contracting Nurgle's Breath Disease (see Gear). Any that fail Toxic Quality's Toughness Test also contract disease. If rolling 2 7's on the Damage roll, instantly die. Explode, and hit everyone in 3d10m with weapon attack.
